verses.text: \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w the|strong="H5020"\w* king, to all \w the|strong="H5020"\w* peoples, nations, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* languages living \w in|strong="H1965"\w* all \w the|strong="H5020"\w* earth: May \w your|strong="H5020"\w* peace \w be|strong="H1934"\w* increased.

\w It|strong="H5922"\w* has seemed good \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H1763"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* make clear \w the|strong="H5922"\w* signs \w and|strong="H1763"\w* wonders which \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Most High God has done \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H1763"\w*.

How great \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H6925"\w* signs! \w and|strong="H6925"\w* how full \w of|strong="H4481"\w* power \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H6925"\w* wonders! \w his|strong="H6925"\w* kingdom \w is|strong="H1768"\w* an eternal kingdom \w and|strong="H6925"\w* \w his|strong="H6925"\w* rule goes on \w from|strong="H4481"\w* generation \w to|strong="H6925"\w* generation.

\w I|strong="H0576"\w*, Nebuchadnezzar, was at rest \w in|strong="H5954"\w* my place, \w and|strong="H6925"\w* all things \w were|strong="H0826"\w* going well \w for|strong="H3046"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* my great house:

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* saw \w a|strong="H5705"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w a|strong="H5705"\w* cause \w of|strong="H0426"\w* great fear \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w*; \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* troubled \w by|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* images \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* mind \w on|strong="H5705"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w by|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* visions \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* head.

\w And|strong="H7229"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w orders|strong="H0560"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Babylon \w to|strong="H0560"\w* come \w in|strong="H0426"\w* before me \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* might \w make|strong="H3046"\w* clear \w to|strong="H0560"\w* me \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sense \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*.

Then \w the|strong="H5922"\w* wonder-workers, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* users \w of|strong="H5922"\w* secret arts, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Chaldaeans, \w and|strong="H0363"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* readers \w of|strong="H5922"\w* signs came \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* me: \w and|strong="H0363"\w* I put \w the|strong="H5922"\w* dream before them but they did not make clear \w the|strong="H5922"\w* sense \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* me.

But at last Daniel \w came|strong="H4291"\w* in before me, he whose name \w was|strong="H3606"\w* Belteshazzar, after \w the|strong="H3606"\w* name of my god, \w and|strong="H7236"\w* in whom is \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit of \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods: \w and|strong="H7236"\w* I put \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dream before him, saying,

O Belteshazzar, master \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wonder-workers, \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* am certain that \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods is \w in|strong="H1753"\w* you, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* you are troubled \w by|strong="H4481"\w* no secret; this is \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dream which \w I|strong="H4481"\w* saw: make clear \w to|strong="H4481"\w* me \w its|strong="H4481"\w* sense.

\w On|strong="H5922"\w* my \w bed|strong="H4903"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w*: there \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* tree \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* middle \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* very high.

\w And|strong="H3652"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* became tall \w and|strong="H3652"\w* strong, stretching up \w to|strong="H0560"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* be seen \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* ends \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* earth:

Its leaves \w were|strong="H1768"\w* fair \w and|strong="H6523"\w* it \w had|strong="H1768"\w* much fruit, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w in|strong="H2508"\w* it \w was|strong="H2423"\w* food enough \w for|strong="H1768"\w* all: \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w field|strong="H1251"\w* \w had|strong="H1768"\w* shade under it, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* birds \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* resting \w in|strong="H2508"\w* its branches, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* it gave food \w to|strong="H5974"\w* all living things.

\w In|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* visions \w of|strong="H4481"\w* my head \w on|strong="H5922"\w* my bed \w I|strong="H4481"\w* saw a watcher, a holy one, coming down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* heaven,

Crying out \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w a|strong="H5705"\w* loud voice; \w and|strong="H0606"\w* this \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w what|strong="H4479"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* said: Let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* tree be cut down \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* branches broken off; let \w its|strong="H3046"\w* leaves be taken off \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* fruit sent \w in|strong="H4437"\w* every direction: let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* beasts get away \w from|strong="H1768"\w* under \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* birds \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w its|strong="H3046"\w* branches:

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* keep \w its|strong="H6591"\w* broken end \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* roots still \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth, \w even|strong="H1768"\w* \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* band \w of|strong="H0426"\w* iron \w and|strong="H4430"\w* brass; let him \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* young grass \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field \w for|strong="H1768"\w* food, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let him \w be|strong="H0426"\w* wet \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dew \w of|strong="H0426"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let \w his|strong="H3046"\w* part \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w with|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts.

Let \w his|strong="H1768"\w* heart \w be|strong="H8160"\w* changed \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H2298"\w* man, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* heart \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H2298"\w* beast \w be|strong="H8160"\w* \w given|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* him; \w and|strong="H6032"\w* let seven \w times|strong="H2298"\w* go by him.

This order \w is|strong="H1768"\w* fixed by \w the|strong="H3606"\w* watchers, \w and|strong="H7236"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* decision \w is|strong="H1768"\w* by \w the|strong="H3606"\w* word \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy ones: \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* living may be certain \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High \w is|strong="H1768"\w* ruler over \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H1768"\w* men, \w and|strong="H7236"\w* gives it \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* man at \w his|strong="H3606"\w* pleasure, lifting up over it \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lowest \w of|strong="H1768"\w* men.

This dream I, King Nebuchadnezzar, saw; \w and|strong="H8065"\w* do you, O Belteshazzar, make clear \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sense \w of|strong="H1753"\w* \w it|strong="H8460"\w*, \w for|strong="H4203"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* wise men \w of|strong="H1753"\w* my kingdom are unable \w to|strong="H8065"\w* make \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sense \w of|strong="H1753"\w* \w it|strong="H8460"\w* clear \w to|strong="H8065"\w* me; but you are able, \w for|strong="H4203"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H1753"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* holy gods is \w in|strong="H1753"\w* you.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* name \w was|strong="H4430"\w* Belteshazzar, \w was|strong="H4430"\w* at a loss \w for|strong="H1768"\w* a time, \w his|strong="H1768"\w* thoughts troubling him. \w The|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* made answer \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said, Belteshazzar, do not be troubled by \w the|strong="H1768"\w* dream \w or|strong="H4430"\w* by \w the|strong="H1768"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H0607"\w*. Belteshazzar, answering, said, \w My|strong="H1768"\w* lord, may \w the|strong="H1768"\w* dream be about your haters, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* its sense about \w those|strong="H1768"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w against|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H0607"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* became tall \w and|strong="H4430"\w* strong, stretching up \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w seen|strong="H2370"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* ends \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*;

\w Which|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* fair leaves \w and|strong="H4430"\w* much fruit, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* food \w for|strong="H1768"\w* all; under \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* field \w were|strong="H1768"\w* living, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* branches \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* birds \w of|strong="H4430"\w* heaven \w had|strong="H4430"\w* their resting-places:

\w It|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, O King, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1934"\w* become great \w and|strong="H0606"\w* strong: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H5922"\w* power \w is|strong="H1768"\w* increased \w and|strong="H0606"\w* stretching up \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w your|strong="H5922"\w* rule \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* end \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H8065"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* vision \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* king saw \w of|strong="H4481"\w* a watcher, a holy one, coming down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0560"\w*, Let \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* be cut down \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w given|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* destruction;

This is \w the|strong="H5922"\w* sense \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w*, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* is \w the|strong="H5922"\w* decision \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Most High which \w has|strong="H4430"\w* come \w on|strong="H5922"\w* my lord \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*:

\w That|strong="H4430"\w* they \w will|strong="H4430"\w* send \w you|strong="H5922"\w* out from \w among|strong="H5922"\w* men, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* be \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field; they \w will|strong="H4430"\w* give \w you|strong="H5922"\w* grass \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w your|strong="H5922"\w* food like \w the|strong="H3606"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* be wet \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4430"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* seven times \w will|strong="H4430"\w* go by \w you|strong="H5922"\w*, till \w you|strong="H5922"\w* are certain \w that|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High is ruler \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H4430"\w* men, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* gives \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* man at \w his|strong="H5922"\w* pleasure.

\w And|strong="H4437"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* gave orders \w to|strong="H5922"\w* let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* broken \w end|strong="H7118"\w* \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* roots \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* tree \w be|strong="H1934"\w*, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* safe \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w after|strong="H7118"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* clear \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H1768"\w* ruling.

\w For|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1668"\w* cause, O \w King|strong="H4430"\w*, let \w my|strong="H1768"\w* suggestion be pleasing \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* let your sins be covered by righteousness \w and|strong="H6032"\w* your evil-doing by mercy \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* poor, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* time \w of|strong="H1005"\w* your well-being may be longer.
All \w this|strong="H4406"\w* \w came|strong="H5308"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*.

At \w the|strong="H5922"\w* end \w of|strong="H4481"\w* twelve months \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H2423"\w* walking \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* roof \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* great house \w in|strong="H4437"\w* Babylon.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* king made answer \w and|strong="H7236"\w* said, \w Is|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H4406"\w* not \w great|strong="H7236"\w* Babylon, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* have made \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* living-place \w of|strong="H4481"\w* kings, \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* strength \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* power \w and|strong="H7236"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* glory \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* honour?

While \w the|strong="H5922"\w* word \w was|strong="H5020"\w* still \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* king's mouth, a voice came down \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, saying, O King \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* said: \w The|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* gone \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8065"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H4101"\w* send \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w from|strong="H1768"\w* among men, \w to|strong="H0560"\w* be \w with|strong="H5648"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3028"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* field; \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H4101"\w* give \w you|strong="H1768"\w* grass \w for|strong="H1768"\w* your food like \w the|strong="H3606"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* seven times \w will|strong="H4101"\w* go by \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, till \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* certain \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High \w is|strong="H1768"\w* ruler \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H3028"\w* men, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* gives it \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* man at \w his|strong="H4223"\w* pleasure.

That very hour \w the|strong="H5922"\w* order \w about|strong="H5922"\w* Nebuchadnezzar \w was|strong="H7238"\w* put into effect: \w and|strong="H4437"\w* he \w was|strong="H7238"\w* sent out from \w among|strong="H5922"\w* men, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* had grass \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* food like \w the|strong="H5922"\w* oxen, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* body \w was|strong="H7238"\w* wet \w with|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* dew \w of|strong="H4437"\w* heaven, till \w his|strong="H5922"\w* hair became long \w as|strong="H4437"\w* eagles' feathers \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* nails like those \w of|strong="H4437"\w* birds.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* at \w the|strong="H3606"\w* end \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* days, \w I|strong="H0576"\w*, \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w*, lifting up \w my|strong="H1768"\w* eyes \w to|strong="H3202"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, got back \w my|strong="H1768"\w* reason, \w and|strong="H4430"\w*, blessing \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Most High, \w I|strong="H0576"\w* gave \w praise|strong="H7624"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* honour \w to|strong="H3202"\w* him \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* living \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* rule \w is|strong="H1768"\w* an eternal rule \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* kingdom goes on \w from|strong="H1768"\w* generation \w to|strong="H3202"\w* generation.

And all the people of the earth are as nothing: he does his pleasure in the army of heaven and among the people of the earth: and no one is able to keep back his hand, or say to him, What are you doing?

At the same time my reason came back to me; and for the glory of my kingdom, my honour and my great name came back to me; and my wise men and my lords were turned to me again; and I was made safe in my kingdom and had more power than before.
Now I, Nebuchadnezzar, give worship and praise and honour to the King of heaven; for all his works are true and his ways are right: and those who go in pride he is able to make low.
